mapper.select: SELECT T.ID, T.FROM_TYPE, T.ORDER_TYPE, T.ORDER_SN, T.USER_ID, T.ORDER_STATUS, T.SHIPPING_STATUS, T.PAY_STATUS, T.PAY_TYPE, T.CONSIGNEE, T.COUNTRY, T.PROVINCE, T.CITY, T.DISTRICT, T.ADDRESS, T.POSTAL_CODE, T.MOBILE, T.POSTSCRIPT, T.SHIPPING_ID, T.SHIPPING_NAME, T.SHIPPING_CODE, T.SHIPPING_NO, T.SHIPPING_FEE, T.PREPAY_ID, T.ACTUAL_PRICE, T.INTEGRAL_MONEY, T.ORDER_PRICE, T.ADD_TIME, T.CONFIRM_TIME, T.PAY_TIME, T.COUPON_ID, T.COUPON_PRICE, T.PARENT_ID, T.SHOPS_ID, T.GOODS_ID, T.EXPIRE_TIME, U.NICKNAME, S.NAME SHOPS_NAME, S.SHOPS_SN, C.TITLE COUPON_TITLE FROM MALL_ORDER T LEFT JOIN MALL_USER U ON T.USER_ID = U.ID LEFT JOIN MALL_SHOPS S ON T.SHOPS_ID = S.ID LEFT JOIN MALL_COUPON C ON T.COUPON_ID = C.ID WHERE T.ID = #{orderId}
